reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 188/98: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY OF MINISTER TO LAMBTON COUNTY (OFFICIAL PLANS)
reg_info.reg_name_text: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY OF MINISTER TO LAMBTON COUNTY (OFFICIAL PLANS)
reg_info.act_under: Planning Act   Loi sur l’aménagement du territoire

content.content: 1. The Minister’s authority with respect to official plans and amendments to official plans under section 17 of the Act is delegated to the council of the County of Lambton with respect to official plans and amendments to official plans for the local municipalities of the County of Lambton whose file numbers are set out in the Schedule. O. Reg. 188/98, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The Minister’s authority with respect to official plans and amendments to official plans under section 17 of the Act is delegated to the council of the County of Lambton with respect to official plans and amendments to official plans for the local municipalities of the County of Lambton whose file numbers are set out in the Schedule. O. Reg. 188/98, s. 1.

content.content: 2. (1) If any of the authority delegated to the council in section 1 is in turn delegated by the council to a committee of council or an appointed officer under subsection 5 (1) of the Act, the council shall forward to the Minister a certified copy of the delegating by–law within 15 days of its passing. O. Reg. 188/98, s. 2 (1). (2) The delegation of authority set out in this Regulation is not terminated by reason only that subsection (1) is not complied with. O. Reg. 188/98, s. 2 (2). SCHEDULE 1. Village of Alvinston 38-OP-3236-006 2. Town of Bosanquet 38-OP-0117-024 38-OP-0117-026 3. Township of Sombra 38-OP-1221 4. Village of Thedford 38-OP-3244-004 O. Reg. 188/98, Sched.
content.raw_html:
2. (1) If any of the authority delegated to the council in section 1 is in turn delegated by the council to a committee of council or an appointed officer under subsection 5 (1) of the Act, the council shall forward to the Minister a certified copy of the delegating by–law within 15 days of its passing. O. Reg. 188/98, s. 2 (1).

(2) The delegation of authority set out in this Regulation is not terminated by reason only that subsection (1) is not complied with. O. Reg. 188/98, s. 2 (2).

SCHEDULE

1. Village of Alvinston

38-OP-3236-006

2. Town of Bosanquet

38-OP-0117-024

38-OP-0117-026

3. Township of Sombra

38-OP-1221

4. Village of Thedford

38-OP-3244-004

O. Reg. 188/98, Sched.
